price: 48.Nabii Saalic magaalal (cijri deqsitta magaala kinnuk) sagla numuy koroosannuu kee uma taamat baaxó bayissay, maqaanet baaxó aymaaqewayta sugte.
arabic: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakāna fī al-madīnati tis'ʿatu rahṭin yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
